name: Panacea (nonygl)
description:
This game was made in 24 hours on a game jam. The theme of the game jam was "a hidden world".

The game is about an adventurer that has to retrieve a sword from the past to stop an evil wizard that unleashed a plague that killed most of the people.

Created by: Nino Potrkač, Mirna Tominac and Petra Stojičić

Mentor: Dominik "Cwekii" Cvetkovski

This game might contain some bugs.
